sample: Hi, I'm the notes contacts shirts bot. I can create delete and read notes and contacts and I can show you t-shirts!
help: you asked for help, I'm sorry but I can't help you
cancel: you cancelled, don't you like me?
create_cancel_contact: This will cancel the creation of the contact you started. Are you sure?
name_new_contact: What would you like to call your new contact?
phone_new_contact: What phone number would you like to give to this contact?
delete_contact: Which contact would you like to delete?
read_contact: Which contact would you like to read?
create_note: What would you like to call your note?
text_note: What would you like to say in your note?
delete_note: Which note would you like to delete?
create_cancel_note: This will cancel the creation of the note you started. Are you sure?
read_note: Which note would you like to read?
shirt_not_found: I'm sorry... That product wasn't found.
shirt_added: A '%(size)s %(product)s' has been added to your cart.
